General.Name: Beijing WKW Automotive Parts Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing WKW Automotive Parts Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive interior and exterior trim systems in China. It offers luggage racks, roof water strips, lower door guards, vice instrument panels, still plates, crash beams, and electroplating parts, as well as side beams, door exteriors, door frames, comer windows, B and C pillars, aluminum/wood interior trims, etc. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

3.Name: Ms. Li Na  Bao
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Non-Independent Director
